name: Bounce Up
description:
Up! Up! Up! Let's Bounce Higher!

Tap the screen and control the little ball, make it hit the block to bounce up!

If you can hit the middle of block, it will have more power to bounce higher!

The more combos you can get, the higher scores you can make!

You could also use some help from the shiny block, it will power you up!

The last thing, when the balls is dropping down, don't miss the block, or game ends!

Features:
* Free to play, play it anywhere anytime
* Suitable for all ages
* Easy to play but hard to control, you'll find its fun!
* Now try to get a higher score and share it with your friends!
